Facebook Twitter Google+ Home › Menu › ButterBurgers ButterBurgers ButterBurger "The Original" The Culver's Deluxe ButterBurger Cheese The Culver's Bacon Deluxe Wisconsin Swiss Melt Cheddar ButterBurger Sourdough Melt Cheddar ButterBurger with Bacon Mushroom&Swiss Roasted Red Pepper Cheddar ButterBurger Taste the small-town family favorite that started it all. Made with fresh, never frozen, 100% U.S. beef, your ButterBurger® is cooked up only after you order, topped just the way you want it and served on a lightly buttered toasted bun.
